content:
10. inside the zone, anything that doesn't require fuel or electricity. Outside the zone, people also mostly walk, or ride horses, because fuel is extremely expensive, and cars, trains, airplanes etc. do exist, but they are just for the few belonging to mid-to-higher social classes.

11. Mostly oil, coal, lithium mines etc. Similar to 21st century.

12. They buy it or rent from Hybrid kingdoms. This is all rapidly dwindling outside the hybrid kingdoms.

13. They have meetings, but only through Raziel. Even when they're in person, Raziel must be present, as he is the only thing keeping them together, advising them all ( even though he's becoming more unreliable by the day, due to Tiamat radiation ).

14. Not really, but due to the failing infrastructure, huge parts of the world now have a much lower population, so there are forests re-growing, deserts expanding, rivers flooding etc.
